message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this fantastic product that I believe will be of great value to you. I'm offering it to you for $10,000, which is a great price considering its worth. Let me know your thoughts!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. I'm willing to pay a premium, but I'm not sure if I'm willing to go all the way up to $10,000.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and offer. While I value your business, I'm not quite ready to drop the price that low. I'm willing to come down to $9,000 to meet you halfway. Let's see if we can find a solution that works for both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to come down to $9,000, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, so I'm going to counter with $9,250. Can you consider that?
